channel.title: How do u block invalid names?
channel.description: How do i block thoes invald names like ones with thies ~ and stuff? :(

item.title: How do u block invalid names?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

In client.java search for

public class client extends Player

And below it add this:

public String invalidnames[] = {"name","name","name","name"};

You will change the “name” to what ever you want to be blocked. Feel free to add more aswell.
Then, still in Client.java add this:

if(playerName.contains(invalidnames[i])) { } else { savefile = false; disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); returnCode = 4; }

Which you can put under this:

public void run();

And there you go, now you can block invalid names from entering your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u block invalid names?
